meta.title: Kalakshetra Odisha - Preserving Cultural Heritage
meta.description: Kalakshetra Odisha is dedicated to preserving and promoting the rich cultural heritage of Odisha through traditional arts, folk performances, and community engagement.

history.title: Our Story
history.description: Kalakshetra Odisha was founded with a vision to preserve and promote the rich cultural heritage of Odisha. Over the years, we have grown into a movement that celebrates traditional arts while empowering communities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading institution for cultural preservation, making Odisha's heritage accessible to all while ensuring its sustainability for future generations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To document, preserve, and promote Odisha's diverse cultural expressions through education, research, community engagement, and artistic programs.
